message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product at a special price of $20,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is too high for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I could only justify paying $8,000.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While I understand the product's value, $17,000 is still above my budget.  Would you consider $10,000?  That's the highest I can go.
